title: Impress the Murder Tribunal
content:
h Candulhallow's Tombstones. "Sicarius" will grant us entry.

Enter the Bhaalist Tribunal under Canduhallow's Tombstones.

We spoke the correct passphrase at Candulhallow's Tombstones and can approach the Murder Tribunal.

Become an Unholy Assassin of Bhaal.

If we want to become Unholy Assassins of Bhaal, we must first prove ourselves by slaying Minsc. If we want to become Unholy Assassins of Bhaal, we must first prove ourselves by slaying Jaheira. If we want to become Unholy Assassins of Bhaal
